text: Stutchkoff is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Nahum Stutchkoff (1893–1965), Yiddish-Polish and later Yiddish-American actor, author, lexicographer, and radio host * Misha Stutchkoff (1918–2003), American television and film screenwriter, radio performer, and actor; see Michael Morris (screenwriter)
title: Stutchkoff
